UDCustomDeviceMain
Scriptname UDCustomDeviceMain extends Quest conditional

Contains all functionality which is relevant to Custom Devices

Device menu

resetCondVar
Function resetCondVar()

Resets all variables which are intended to be used by messages  to show buttons

disableStruggleCondVar
Function disableStruggleCondVar(
bool abDisableLock = true,
bool abUselessStruggle = false
)

Resets all struggle related variables which are intended to be used by messages to show buttons

Parameters
abDisableLock
bool

Also disable lock related buttons

abUselessStruggle
bool

Also disable useless struggle button

CheckAndDisableSpecialMenu
Function CheckAndDisableSpecialMenu()

Validate if special menu should be shown. Should be called after changes to any currentDeviceMenu_switchX variable was done

Generic
MakeNewDeviceSlots
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript[] Function MakeNewDeviceSlots()
Returns

New array of devices. Size of array is same as maximum amount of devices which can have one actor registered at once

DisableActor
Function DisableActor(
Actor akActor,
int aiIsPlayer = -1
)

Wrapper of function StartMinigameDisable

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to disable

aiIsPlayer
int

If actor is player. Is optional and inteded to fasten up the function as there will be not need to check if actor is player if this value 1

Function StartMinigameDisable(
Actor akActor,
Int aiIsPlayer = -1
)

StopMinigame
Function StopMinigame(
Actor akActor,
Bool abWaitForStop
)

Will try to stop current minigame in which is akActor. Will not work if akActor is not wearer of the device

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to process

abWaitForStop
Bool

Function will ba blocked untill minigame fully stops

int Function unregisterDevice(
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript akDevice,
int aiStartID = 0,
bool abSort = True
)

Actor have to be registred for this function to work!

Parameters
akDevice
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript

Device to unregister

aiStartID
int

Start index from which will function unregister device. Used for optimization

abSort
bool

If slots should be sorted after device is unregistered

Returns

Number of unregistered devices

LockDevice
Function LockDevice(
form akActor,
form akDeviceInventory,
int aiForce
)

Lock akDeviceInventory on akActor.

This function is blocking and will be blocked untill the device is fully locked, or untill error occurs

Parameters
akActor
form

Actor to lock device on

akDeviceInventory
form

Device to lock

aiForce
int

If the lock operation should be forced

See:  LockDeviceParalel

LockDeviceParalel
Function LockDeviceParalel(
actor akActor,
armor akDeviceInventory,
bool abForce = false
)

Lock akDeviceInventory on akActor.

This function will create paralel thread which does all operation, and thus is not blocking.

Parameters
akActor
actor

Actor to lock device on

akDeviceInventory
armor

Device to lock

abForce
bool

If the lock operation should be forced

See:  LockDevice

getStruggleDifficultyModifier
float Function getStruggleDifficultyModifier()

Returns modifier float number. The harder the difficulty, the bigger this number is.

Depends on MCM setting of both DD and UD.

Intended to be used by Struggle minigames

Returns

Modifier. In case that default MCM setting is used, this number will be 1.0

getMendDifficultyModifier
float Function getMendDifficultyModifier()

Returns modifier float number. The harder the difficulty, the bigger this number is.

Depends on MCM setting of both DD and UD.

Intended to be used by any regen related modifiers

Returns

Modifier. In case that default MCM setting is used, this number will be 1.0

HelpNPC
Bool Function HelpNPC(
Actor akVictim,
Actor akHelper,
Bool abAllowCommand
)

Opends the list of registered npcs on akVictim.

Selecting the device will open Device menu with relevnt options.

Parameters
akVictim
Actor

Actor that is getting the help

akHelper
Actor

Actor who is helping akVictim

abAllowCommand
Bool

If player can command the NPC. Is ignored if akVictim is Player

Returns

All outer menus must be closed

Example
HelpNPC(SomeNPC,Player,False)  -> Player can help SomeNPC, but can't command them
HelpNPC(Follower,Player,False) -> Player can help Follower, and can command them
HelpNPC(Player,SomeNPC,False)  -> SomeNPC can help Player
ShowHelpDeviceMenu
Bool Function ShowHelpDeviceMenu(
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript akDevice,
Actor akHelper,
Bool abAllowCommand,
Bool abIgnoreCooldown = false
)

Opends the Device menu of specific device with helper set to akHelper

Parameters
akDevice
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript

Device on which will be menu opened

akHelper
Actor

Actor who is helping akVictim

abAllowCommand
Bool

If player can command the NPC. Is ignored if device wearer is Player

abIgnoreCooldown
Bool

If Helper cooldown should be ignored

Returns

All outer menus must be closed

CheckRenderDeviceConflict
int Function CheckRenderDeviceConflict(
Actor akActor,
Armor akRendDevice
)

Check if passed akRendDevice can be correctly locked on akActor

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor whos conflict will be checked

akRendDevice
Armor

Render device

Returns
|=======================================================================|
|   returns |           Meaning                                         |
|=======================================================================|
|    00     =     No issue                                              |
|    01     =     Same device is already equipped                       |
|    02     =     Different device is already equipped in same slot     |
|    03     =     Other issue                                           |
|=======================================================================|
getActorCuttingWeaponMultiplier
Float Function getActorCuttingWeaponMultiplier(
Actor akActor
)

Calculates multiplier for cutting minigame. Value is decided by weapon with sharp wapon with most dmg

Is much faster if NPC is registered, otherwise it will need to search whole inventory

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check

Returns

Actors smithing skill as modifier value. Depends on MCM setting and amount of skill

getFirstDeviceByKeyword
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript Function getFirstDeviceByKeyword(
Actor akActor,
keyword akKwd1,
keyword akKwd2 = none,
keyword akKwd3 = none,
int aiMode = 0
)

Utility script for fetching UD device scripts

Note: Keywords are checked on render device. Main keyword is ignored

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check

akKwd1
keyword

Render Keyword 1 to check

akKwd2
keyword

Render Keyword 2 to check

akKwd3
keyword

Render Keyword 3 to check

aiMode
int

0 => AND (device needs all provided keyword), 1 => OR (device need one provided keyword)

Returns

First device script that meets condition. Returns none if device is not present

See: getLastDeviceByKeyword, getAllDevicesByKeyword

getDeviceScriptByRender
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript Function getDeviceScriptByRender(
Actor akActor,
Armor akDeviceRendered
)

Allow to return device script from actor that is not registered.

This is done by doing some black magick fuckery

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor that have the device equipped

akDeviceRendered
Armor

Render device

Returns

Device script. This is not copy but actual script. Because of that it is possible to reregister NPC that unregistered before.

getDeviceInventoryScriptByID
UD_CustomDevice_EquipScript Function getDeviceInventoryScriptByID(
Actor akActor,
Armor akDeviceInventory
)

Allow to return inventory device script from actor

This is done by doing some black magick fuckery

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor that have the device equipped

akDeviceInventory
Armor

Inventory device

Returns

Inventory Device script. This is not copy but actual script. In case there are multiple instances of same script, only first will be returned

getDeviceScriptByKw
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript Function getDeviceScriptByKw(
Actor akActor,
Keyword akKw
)

Same as getDeviceScriptByRender, but returns device based on main keyword

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor that have the device equipped

akKw
Keyword

Main DD keyword

Returns

Device script. This is not copy but actual script. Because of that it is possible to reregister NPC that unregistered before.

Utility
ChangeSoulgemState
bool Function ChangeSoulgemState(
Actor akActor,
Int aiSoulgemType,
bool abState = true
)

Changes state of one of the actors soulgems

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check

aiSoulgemType
Int

Type of soulgem (0=Petty,1=Lesser,2=Common,3=Great,4=Grand)

abState
bool

True = Discharge, False = Charge

Returns

True if operation was succesfull

ShowSoulgemMessage
Int Function ShowSoulgemMessage(
Actor akActor,
Bool abEmpty = false
)

Opens menu that allow user to select which soulgem they want to use

If akActor doesn't have the soulgem, it will not show

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check

abEmpty
Bool

True=Player choose empty soulgem, False=Player choose filled soulgem

Returns

0=Petty,1=Lesser,2=Common,3=Great,4=Grand

startVibFunction
bool Function startVibFunction(
UD_CustomVibratorBase_RenderScript akCustomVibrator,
bool abBlocking = false
)

Makes passed akCustomVibrator to vibrate

Parameters
akCustomVibrator
UD_CustomVibratorBase_RenderScript

Vibrator which will be turned on

abBlocking
bool

If function should be blocked untill vibrations fully start

Returns

True if operation was succesfull

getGaggedLevel
int Function getGaggedLevel(
Actor akActor
)

Calculates Gag difficulty level

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check

Returns
|=======================================|
|   returns |           Meaning         |
|=======================================|
|    00     =     Not gagged            |
|    01     =     Normal gag            |
|    02     =     Large gag             |
|    03     =     Close mouth gag       |
|=======================================|

ReduceKeyDurability
Int Function ReduceKeyDurability(
Actor akActor,
Form akKey,
Int aiDurability = 1
)

Changes key durability by aiDurability.

Destroys key once durability reaches 0.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to process

akKey
Form

Key to check

aiDurability
Int

By how much (can be both positive and negative)

Returns

Durability after it is updated

ManifestDevices
int Function ManifestDevices(
Actor akActor,
string asSource ,
int aiChance,
int aiNumber
)

Locks actor in specific number of device Parameters:

akActor

Actor to lock device on

asSource

string which will be printed as source of device manifest

aiChance

Chance devices will be manifested (0-100)

Returns

Number of devices locked

SetPlayerFollower
function SetPlayerFollower(
actor akActor,
bool abFollow,
int aiAliasIndex = 1
)

Forces NPC to followe player. This also stops any packages/idles Copied from ORomance

Parameters
akActor
actor

Actor which will follow player

abFollow
bool

If actor should start or stop following player

aiAliasIndex
int

Which slot to use. By default there are 2 slots, so player can have 2 following actors at once. Valid values are 1 and 2
